mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PLAYER WHERE P_ROLE like '%'||#{p_role}||'%'
SELECT A.p_no, B.* FROM BATTER B, PLAYER A WHERE A.p_no = B.p_no and A.p_no = #{p_no}
select a.p_no, a.p_name, a.p_position, a.lr, a.game, b.ip, b.phr, b.pso, b.phits, b.pbb from player a, pitcher b where a.p_no = b.p_no

select a.p_no, a.p_name, a.p_position, a.lr, a.game, b.pa, b.singles, b.doubles, b.triples, b.hr, b.bb, b.rbi, b.strikeouts, b.hbp, b.lineup from player a, batter b where a.p_no = b.p_no order by lineup
select a.ap_order, a.a_name, a.ap_name, a.ap_position, b.a_image from away_player a join away b ON a.a_name = b.a_name where a.a_name = #{a_name}
